Name: The Last Hope: Zombie Defense TD
About the game: Become the defender of tomorrow in a world taken over by dangerous zombies! Help the guards stop them, they can't do it without you! Abandoned farm, dark forest, post-apocalyptic city, haunted hospital are just a tiny part of the maps where you can test your strategies in the classic Tower Defense! Defenders defend themselves with what they find along the way... Unlock and decide which units will join your team! Choose which passive upgrades you choose and create your own development tree! Take on epic bosses with dangerous mechanics! Use active skills to help you defeat evil... Collect all of over 30 achievements! Fight for the top of the endless mode online ranking! We love contact with you, in case of any ideas, suggestions, problem with game, please contact us! For backstage content, beta things, memes about game, check out our official channel in Instagram! duk_games
